title: Dated voting machines raise alarms for 2018 midterms
text:
Dated voting machines raise alarms for 2018 midterms 12:26pm BST - 02:04
Control of the U.S. Congress in the 2018 midterm elections could be tipped by more than a dozen tight races in states that are still using voting machines that cannot fully be checked for hacking or manipulation, raising concerns not just of meddling but of a collapse in voter confidence at a delicate political moment.
